Demo Gallery

Explore modern CSS capabilities through tiered demonstrations. From pure CSS state management to scroll-driven animations and View Transitions.

Tier 1

Pure CSS (No JavaScript)

01

Layout Switcher

Switch between 5 different page layouts using radio buttons and the :checked pseudo-class. Zero JavaScript required.

:checked CSS Grid Custom Properties
02

Tabs & Accordion

Radio button tabs and native <details> exclusive accordion using the name attribute. Fully accessible.

:checked <details> Accessible
03

Responsive Grid

Container queries, auto-fit/minmax(), and CSS Subgrid for aligned card content. Interactive resizable container.

@container Subgrid auto-fit
04

Landing Page

Full marketing landing page using data-layout="landing" with named grid areas for hero, features, and CTA sections.

Named Grid Areas Landing Layout
Tier 2

Minimal JS (Data Attribute Flipping)

05

Dashboard

Collapsible sidebar with ~7 lines of JavaScript. CSS handles all visual transitions. Mobile drawer pattern included.

data-* CSS Transitions Mobile Drawer
06

Theme Builder

Interactive sliders manipulate CSS custom properties in real-time. Export your custom theme as CSS.

Custom Properties Runtime Theming Export
Tier 3

Maximal JS (Enhanced Interactions)

07

Component Lab

Interactive testing environment with component selector, theme comparison, variant toggles, and code export.

Component Explorer Code Export A11y Panel
08

Animation & Motion

Scroll-driven animations using animation-timeline: view(), View Transitions API, and theme-specific motion personalities.

Scroll-Driven View Transitions Motion Tokens
